document.full_text: mexico extradited the once-powerful drug lord benjamin arellano felix to the united states on friday in a renewed sign of u.s.-mexican cooperation in the drug fight.
document.title: mexico extradites once-powerful drug lord to u.s.
lines_and_colors: mexico extradited the once-powerful drug lord benjamin arellano felix to the united states on friday in a renewed sign of u.s.-mexican cooperation in the drug fight.
